AllenCaine.TDPack
(This is the dev version of TD Enhancement Pack. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!) Unofficial 1.3 Update I only changed some code lines, so the mod is compatible with the new 1.3 RimWorld code. This mod is only available until the original mod from Uuugggg is updated. More Infos: https://github.com/AllenCaine/RimWorld-EnhancementPack Any Issues: https://github.com/AllenCaine/RimWorld-EnhancementPack/issues?q=
